channel.title: vim on NateUsher.com
channel.description: Recent content in vim on NateUsher.com

item.title: Vim + live-server
item.description: I recently switched back to using vim as my full time editor after using VS Code for a few years. I always did like Vim (I used an extension in VS Code to get vim keybindings), but I felt like I was missing a few productivity features, and wasn’t willing to put the time into setting Vim up properly. Now I see that it is definitely worth the effort. One thing I missed from VS Code was the live-reload extension, which is indespensible when doing front-end development.
